revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ASUS |model=WL-500W |revision=(R1.11) |upc=0610839725786 |ean=0610839725786 |image1=ASUS WL-500W.jpg |image1_size=300px |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Askey |availability=unavailable |price=130 |est_release_date=10/26/2006 |fcc_date=08/01/2006 |fcc_id=MSQWL500W |type=wireless router |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM4704;BCM4704KPBG; |cpu1_cspeed=264 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV640BUTC-90G |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=HY5DU281622ETP-5 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, Mini PCI |expansion_minipci_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=2 |serial=yes,, 2x 4-pin header |wi1_module=ASUS WL-121W |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4321L;BCM4321LKFBG; |wi1_chip2_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip2_model=BCM2055 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM5325F;BCM5325FKQMG; |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=100M |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=USB 2.0 Host Controller;VIA;VT6212L;;1; |tp_firmware=Oleg (wl500g), DD-WRT, Oleg-ng (wl500g), TomatoUSB, FreshTomato |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=default |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=00:22:15 |oui_eth=00:22:15 }} {{TagLine|Wireless Super Speed N Router}} :[http://www.asus.com/Networks/Wireless_Routers/WL500W/ Product page]
The wireless card has "WL-121W R1.03" silkscreened on in it in the FCC photos. :The device is using a VIA VT6212L USB 2.0 controller. :The manual says the default SSID is '''default'''.
{{TechInfoDepot|Asus_WL-500W}}
*[http://www.dd-wrt.com/wiki/index.php/Asus_WL500W On the '''DD-WRT''' wiki] *[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=7275 On the '''OpenWrt''' forums] :Boot log specifies the CPU speed as 264MHz *[http://wl500g.info/showthread.php?6317-Exclusive-Asus-WL-500w-pictures! On the '''wl500g''' forums] :[http://wl500g.info/showthread.php?15770-wl-500w-inside-view Inside view pictures] *[http://www.thg.ru/network/asus_wl500w_wl130n/ Review on '''THG''']
